main.name: Tico Clark
main.description: I'm a Santa Ana based Full Stack Developer, using ReactJs/Redux, JavaScript, C#, MS SQL Server to help people and companies craft their presence or message in the Internet Universe. Let's start scrolling and learn more about me.
main.bio: I offer a unique work experience and acumen in digital technology from programming, cloud to networking IP. This background is driven with can-do attitude, part analytical and creative mind, and tenacious thirst for learning

testimonials.text: Tico is a strategic thinker who truly understands the technical and client function. He is a creative thinker who considers different perspectives to improve outcomes and recognizes opportunities to improve processes.

We have worked together on multiple technology projects that included file organization, marketing and resource allocation. Tico was very thorough in his analysis. He researched multiple options, analyzes which will work best and then makes his recommendation. Working with Tico is a pleasure.
